fullText: Sutton Foster's return to Broadway in this revival of the 1959 musical is a reminder of what musical comedy can be when it's done right: silly, sincere and supremely entertaining.

nycTheatreExcerpt: When it comes to this particular couple, Urie and Foster make you believe in a happy future that may include all kinds of calisthenics.
